commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I can't believe you two. Trying to trick her and steal her snacks like that! What in the world were you thinking?!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: We weren't trying to trick her. It was just a little prank, that's all.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Whatever your intentions were, what you did was inexcusable!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I'm shocked by Chika's behavior, but Ruby! I thought you would at least know better than to go along with this!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: *Sniff* I'm sorry. I just wanted a sweet potato tart. Even though I knew those snacks were for Î¼'s... I'm so sorry!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: *Sigh* Well, it's not at all like Ruby to take part in a prank like this. This has to be because of Chika's influence.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: U-Umi, you can leave it at that. They seem to be sorry for what they've done. Right, you two?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: See? And all of the snacks were safe in the end.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: No, we cannot let them get away with this. You were fooled by them, Emma. Don't you realize that?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: We must be strict and teach them on the spot that what they did is wrong. Feeling sorry for them and going easy on them will do them no favors.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: And sure, Ruby might be sorry, but has Chika truly reflected on her actions? She responded rather cheerfully just now.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: That's not true at all. I know what I did was very wrong.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: You can't fool me by making that face. In any case, those snacks were for...

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Chika, Ruby, I've been looking all over for you!
